name: Jump Blocks
description:
This is my first 2D game in Unity. I was just learning how to do 2D platforms, and I just made a game of what I learned. This is not to be a difficult game but just a chill game to play.
Thanks for playing
BTW. I stream on twitch where I stream me coding and doing art
https://www.twitch.tv/coolmintcrush
discord where I post all my thoughts/progression and game dev. ideas
